name: Tyree Pitts
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I enjoy gardening as it is the best way for humans to get proper food and nutrition. The process helps me establish an efficient process and routine, which keeps me organized daily.

My knowledge about strains is good from being a Long time patient myself but mostly from my own experience working with cannabis plants. I have a great sense of compassion for all walks of life and would be honored to serve the medical marijuana community. Helping patients with diseases and various ailments find products/strains that improve the quality of their daily life is something I know I could be great at. Helping others has been a lifelong practice for me and I feel strongly about cannabis’ healing capabilities. In addition to these things, I have great organizational skills and am extremely punctual. Operating my own small grow and working up north has helped me understand the passion and discipline this business requires, and I would like to be able to carry these tools to a dispensary. A majority of my previous work experience has been farming with cannabis plants and a various vegetables and herbs . I had a couple brief customer service jobs when I was living on the east coast so I know I would be comfortable greeting/conversing with patients and following the tasks given by management. I have basic computer skills.
